name: Catch'em (itch)
description:
Catch all the #s falling from the sky.

A simple 2D game I made for TweetTweetJam4. It was a free theme jam but the only condition was to limit the game code to 560 characters(spaces included) and not external sprite-sheets.

Controls:

Left/Right arrow keys.

Github: https://github.com/ufrshubham/TweetTweetJam4-Catch_em
